room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Had a great experience. The Kidnapping room was awesome and very well put together. Nick, the game master was fun and helpful. Definitely planning on going back.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Breakout Games is awesome! My friends and I went for the first time to do their room: The Kidnapping. Our game master, Nick was super helpful in giving us clues and attentive. We were able to escape in 59 minutes. Give it a try! We will definitely come back in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Went last weekend with my husband and best friend for his birthday and we had an awesome time! Marley was there and she was awesome! We will definitely be back to do more rooms, we did the Kidnapping one and got out at 54:12!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Just got out of the “Kidnapping” Escape room! Was such a blast! Nicholas was a great help and made the experience fun! Will return in our next visit to VA!

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: AVOID—dishonest managementThis is a chain, so the rooms are very cookie cutter, inexpensively designed and somewhat predictable. The worst problem is their dishonest management. I had only paid through Groupon before, but when looking at their online booking engine, noticed they were charging 10% taxes. There is no applicable tax in Chesterfield County, so I contacted them to let them know and they reduced it to 7%. I contacted again and let them know that no amount of tax was appropriate and they claim to be charging "admissions tax." The City of Richmond has an admissions tax, but Chesterfield does not. Further contact has gone ignored. Upon checking a few of their other locations, I see that they charge around 10% "taxes" for each of them. This is tax fraud. They are clearly not remitting this income to the municipalities in which they operate. They're just jacking your price up after the fact. You'll have a much better (and honest) experience at River City, Ravenchase or Room Escape USA—all ethically managed with much more immersive and creative design. Avoid this one.

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Did the kidnapping room and loved it! Great bonding experience

room_title: Escape room "The Kidnapping" by Breakout Games - Richmond in Richmond (VA)
review: Our family of four had a great time in the Kidnapped game tonight!
